tool_description: All endpoints are available in the free tier! Cryptocurrency financial data API for major exchanges. Candlesticks (OHLCV, VWAP, and Trade Count), Trades (tick-level). Spot and futures markets. Robust data catalog and documentation.
name: Cryptocurrency Financial Data
title: Cryptocurrency Financial Data

api_list.name: OHLCV&VWAP Spot
api_list.description: Price and volume metrics for spot markets

required_parameters.name: market_venue
required_parameters.description: The name of an exchange or a venue

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start of the requested time period, *%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S* UTC timezone

required_parameters.name: base
required_parameters.description: The second listed currency of a currency pair

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The first listed currency of a currency pair

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The ordering of events: `asc` (from earliest to latest), `desc` (from latest to earliest)

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: End of the requested time period, *%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S* UTC timezone

api_list.name: OHLCV&VWAP Futures
api_list.description: Price and volume metrics for futures markets

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The first listed currency of a currency pair

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start of the requested time period, UTC timezone

required_parameters.name: base
required_parameters.description: The second listed currency of a currency pair

required_parameters.name: market_venue
required_parameters.description: The name of exchange or venue

optional_parameters.name: delivery_date
optional_parameters.description: The last day when a future contract is valid - *YYYY-MM-DD*

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The ordering of events: `asc` (from earliest to latest), `desc` (from latest to earliest)

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: End of the requested time period, UTC timezone

optional_parameters.name: expiration
optional_parameters.description: The lifespan of a futures contract. Allowed values: `perpetual`(default), `weekly`, `quarterly`, `monthly`

api_list.name: Metadata
api_list.description: The full list of supported markets

market_venue.description: The name of exchange or venue

symbol.description: The first listed currency of a currency pair

base.description: The second currency in the pair (also known as quote currency or counter currency)

earliest_date.description: The earliest date when this market appears in our database

latest_date.description: The latest date when this market appears in our database

api_list.name: Trades Spot

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start of the requested time period, *%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S* UTC timezone

required_parameters.name: market_venue
required_parameters.description: The name of an exchange or a venue

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The first or base currency in the traded pair

required_parameters.name: base
required_parameters.description: The second or quote currency in the traded pair

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: End of the requested time period, *%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S* UTC timezone

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return, max `10000`

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The ordering of results: `asc` (from earliest to latest), `desc` (from latest to earliest)

api_list.name: Trades Futures

required_parameters.name: market_venue
required_parameters.description: The name of an exchange or a venue

required_parameters.name: base
required_parameters.description: The second listed currency of a currency pair

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The first listed currency of a currency pair

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return, max `10000`

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: End of the requested time period, *%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S* UTC timezone

optional_parameters.name: expiration
optional_parameters.description: The lifespan of a futures contract. Allowed values: `perpetual`(default), `weekly`, `quarterly`, `monthly`

optional_parameters.name: delivery_date
optional_parameters.description: The last day when a future contract is valid - *YYYY-MM-DD*

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Start of the requested time period, *%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S* UTC timezone

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The ordering of results: `asc` (from earliest to latest), `desc` (from latest to earliest)
